name: Letters (PixelFr0ggie, fizzd, ardhanfadh)
description:
Description:

A boy and a girl from two very different places in the world. Will they be able to connect with each other?

A casual rhythm game made during the Level Up KL 2016 game jam.

Date: November,  2016

Duration: 2 days

Creds: 

1. Hafiz Azman

2. Samantha Tan

3. Leow Kean Tat

4. Ardhan Fadhlurrahman

5. Me
__________

Controls:
Space     -     Flip clouds
